reviews_data.review_text: Great place for coffee specialty drinks!

Very cool, neighborhood coffee shop. Lots of seating options outside in yard, outside at picnic table, inside with work tables, upstairs small tables, sofa....but its SMALL ANDNALWAYS CROWDED. 2  bathroom downstairs. (There might be upstairs bathroom). Prices average for Plaza Midwood $3.00 coffee. And there was HONEY for tea. Very nice to sit w/friend, to work or solo...IF YOU FIND A SPOT. Enjoy.peace

Great breakfast burrito and the empanada selection was fantastic. We got one of each and they were all unique and delicious in their own way. Coffee was coffee and pretty well priced. I can't stress enough how good the burrito is. Super simple, fresh, and seasoned. I will be a regular for sure & will be adding it to the weekend breakfast rotation now that I live in the area.
Perfect cup of coffee!
Great lattes and good atmosphere!
thought it was pretty good. tried the dirty chai, nothing wow but still very tasty. would try one of their empanadas next time
The best coffee i've ever had☕
Recommended by the server at Midwood BBQ. This place has great coffee and pastries.
Love the empanadas
Definitely recommend for work/study with plenty of outlets and fast internet. Great coffee. Free flat and sparkling water. Parking is easy. Definitely recommend!

Love coming here to take one-on-one coffee and with groups. Water on tap in addition to beer and wine available. They have a great kitchen, with empanadas standing out the most. They host multiple community centered events. Despite being the new shop in town, they have done an excellent job becoming a part of the micro community and not just another coffee shop.
Great service, coffee and empanadas. Plenty of space on two floors both indoors and outdoors. Also great location.
This coffee shop is super cool!  Great coffee and comfortable atmosphere.   Super busy!  I would recommend.
Always an upbeat vibe and friendly team!

On a first visit with a friend made here yesterday, just by the surroundings, I immediately knew, the offerings here are not just made but crafted. For an experience that will delight all your senses, I highly recommend a visit to The Giddy Goat.

I've been showing up to Giddy almost every week without fail for the last year and a half to dump a big ol' group order of drinks, and every week the Giddy team delivers. Every barista is kind and patient as I read my list of demands, and the drinks are always made quickly and with the utmost care.  Fantastic coffee shop run by an incredible team. If you live in Charlotte, or are visiting Charlotte, and haven't been here, don't miss out.  Also, those empanadas. Golly.
Awsome coffee and scone.

Loved this little coffee place! I live in NYC and spent the weekend in NC trying different local spots and this one was our pick for Sunday breakfast and it did not disappoint. We had a pastry, some empanadas and coffees and were both pleased with the quick service and quality.

Definitely enjoyed this place. It has a great vibe and they have a great location. The menu isn't huge, but what's there is delicious. They have an upstairs and a downstairs lounge area, and plenty of seating outside as well. Completely worth the trip if you've never been.
Great coffee shop in Plaza Midwood. Tip: for true coffee lovers, try a Corrado instead of an extra shot with your Latte

The food was really good and really good coffee I just wish they had more vegan options.  Service was OK but some of the staff was a little standoffish and almost felt like they were kind of ignoring you. I'm not expecting them to go overboard go overboard on greeting you but but at least a hello or smile or something is always nit is always nice when you have customers.  The store was clean and it was packed.
Great coffee and relaxing environment

Catch all coffee shop. Good for working out of, small breakfast items, good coffee. Overall a great spot. Although there may be better coffee shops for specifics like coffee quality, vibe, working out of, this one checks the box on all of these and has a good community atmosphere, even yoga some mornings.
Absolutely love this place. We go here at least once a week if not more. Breakfast burritos are amazing, and coffee drinks are consistently really good.
Nice people. Good vibe. Ok coffee
Oat milk cappuccino is the best
The beverages are solid here. I'll have to give the Burrito another go before I weigh in on that.
Amazing breakfast burritos on the weekend!
The staff here are quick, super friendly, and great at their jobs! Great coffee!
Cute, clean, good coffee and breakfast. Our pup enjoyed her time here too. We'll definitely be back!

I enjoyed a half hot cocoa mixed with half coffee and a breakfast pastry that was delicious. The relaxating atmosphere was very comforting. The smell of the freshly roasted coffee beans and the sweet comfort of the service dog coming to sit beside me at my table. I love the local artist work on the walls and the story behind how they created their name.
Great coffee and service.  The Mediterranean and Patagonia empanadas are my favorites.

This shop utilizes its space so efficiently; there is an amazing amount of workspace for laptop folks, comfortable seating for groups, solos, and patio space on the second floor outdoors as well as a large patio on the first floor outside. They roast their own beans in house, and have a wide variety of baked goods, empanadas, and really good looking wraps. They also have normal and sparkling water on tap for free?? And a very clean bathroom. I was really impressed! I had the coffee of the day and a vegana empanada and both were great.
Closed due to building maintenance.
Can get a little back up and slow, but everything is delicious and the staff are very nice.
Such a quaint coffee shop. Great vibes and delicious coffee! The banana bread was fresh, delicious and warm.
One of few coffee shops open late, Tuesday and Friday. Good coffee and very good scones. Good baristas, very good owner.

Meh.  Lavender latte was alright. Foam was nice and thick, and espresso flavor was smooth, but the lavender flavor was weak.  Blueberry scone was oddly bland with an awful texture.  Guy ringing me up kept calling me "dude". Like, okay BRO.
Absolutely love this place!!! #LocalRoasted
Coffee is amazing the line was out the door and still so fast, the coffee shop dog was a bonus!
My fav charlotte coffee shop :) such yummy options
Great local place, one of my favorite coffee shops. Their chai latte is amazing!
Always nice employees!
Best coffee in Charlotte! Beautiful spacious interior and delicious empanadas, hands down my favorite place

Truly our favorite coffee shop in Charlotte! Giddy Goat is perfectly located in the heart of Plaza Midwood, has a wide offering of coffees/snacks/draft beers and has SO much comfortable indoor and outdoor seating (perfect for working remotely).  This coffee shop goes above and beyond with touches like a water tap with both still & sparkling options, fresh specialty empanadas, great background music and more. No joke, I could live here - it's that great. Keep up the amazing work, GG!
Ethan helped me pick out the right drink. He let me taste all 3 nitro cold brew options (light, medium, dark) and I went with dark. So good! It was $5.
Always a perfect iced latte
Great internet cafe! Fills up but seating available outside.

One empanada for this Venezuelan-descendant (MY grandmother brought over the best!) and I decided to order several more to take home for lunch during the week. I can't say I'm in the neighborhood frequently enough to try more (twice now), but I'll be back.

My wife and I love coming here! The coffee is superb as well as the empanadas. The staff is super nice and attentive. They always work extremely hard. The vibe of the whole place is excellent. If you can catch them on a roasting day the smell, even outside, is amazing.

The Giddy Goat is an awesome coffee shop/cafe with great drinks and food. The Nitro coffee is some of the best I've ever had, they have a great range of empanadas, and the burritos that are available on the weekend are phenomenal. There is a ton of sitting room so this would also make a great place to come and work.
Giddy Goat is my go-to (and favorite) coffee shop in Charlotte! The vibe, energy, coffee, snacks and staff are all amazing!
Breakfast burrito was everything I hoped it would be. Great seating as well.
A very delicious coffee with a unique flavor!  Check them out you won't regret it!
Great all around. We loved the Nitro tra, flat white, empanada and protein bites. We will definitely go bsck

Exceptional coffee shop. Plenty of different seating options as well as great Wi-Fi. Staff was friendly and attentive. You just have to try the empanadas, incredible. One of the best work away from home places in Charlotte.
Always the best!
Really good coffee.
Love it!

My favorite coffee shop in Charlotte! Great coffee and a quick bite. The staff are also so nice. I accidentally broke a mug and felt terrible but they were so kind about it. Despite the accident, I do love that when you get coffee for here they give it to you in a solid coffee mug. Great place for working or catching up with friends. Check out the second story and outdoor deck.
Probably one of the best coffee shops in the charlotte area. Big, quiet, and chill. Coffee refills are free too. However, the parking is quite small but that is not really in thier control.
We love coming to the Giddy Goat. They're always so friendly, quick and helpful. Their coffee is great and the lattes come with two shots (always a plus!).
I really like the atmosphere 😍good coffee 👍🏻
Love Giddy Goat… great coffee and they have yoga on Wednesday mornings which is so fun!

Giddy Goat is a wonderful addition to the commonwealth. It is consistently slammed!  Cons: parking. The parking sucks. Since it's always busy here the parking lot is regularly full. Furthermore... the empanadas. The flavor is on point. I've tried every empanada and honestly I love them but sometimes I can't get past the raw dough in the middle and on the bottom. They need a minimum of another 5 minutes in the oven since they aren't fried. Check the bottoms! I would love to see the crust a more golden brown across the entire pastry and not just a few spots on the top.  Pros: coffee! Love that they roast their own coffee. It's delicious. The staff that serves it up is always polite, personable, and kind. The overall environment at giddy goat is amazing. A great sense of community. You can tell that people love coming here. The atmosphere is perfect for meet ups, business, college students, family. I also love that GG does coffee and workouts, yoga and coffee, and dance lessons. There's also live music almost every week and tons of local art for sale.  I come here regularly and will continue to do so. As soon as I see those empanadas not as raw.. the 5th star will come.  I wish y'all great business!
Good service and good breakfast options.

Fabulous coffee, atmosphere, and empanadas. It is so clear that they take pride in what they do. If you sit on the second level you can watch them in the kitchen making empanadas from scratch. I have gotten both lattes and drip coffee from here and it never disappoints!

We stopped in on a whim, parking wasn't fun but the coffee and food was really good.  Set up is really cool, classic coffee shop feel, almost like the environment was plucked out of Munich at the turn of the 20th century.
Giddy goat is hands down one of my favorite coffee shops in any city! Even when there is a bit of a line, they're extremely quick and the whole group of staff are all so nice.
Great service and I LOVE the empanadas! Great coffee too!
Long line - but it moved quickly and efficiently.
Kind, good coffee, easy to grab food offering. Only suggestion is to have the breakfast burrito all week long! It's so good
The vibe here is great, as is the coffee. Their nitro tastes like a morning Guinness.
Lovely customer service & environment! Great coffee. They have the best fresh roasted coffee beans.
Nice Atmosphere. Amazing Coffee 10 out of 10

The space, food, and coffee is actually a 5 star, but my experience 2 out of 3 visits was so bad I had to rate the experience a 1.  The staff is arrogant, condescending, and overall unpleasant to interact with. On one occasion I asked for my coffee to be made a specific way (not uncommon in the coffee world) and the staff repeatedly argued with me regarding my order. You'll be made to feel like an idiot and inconvenience with any questions you may ask the staff. I want to support local but when the first people you interact with before your morning coffee are actually grumpy goats it's a bad way to start your day.
It has to be people that they know that is giving them a 5 star. Cause I got a iced coffee and it tasted like iced milk. Even the muffin was dry. I spent 32 dollars for two people.😤
Best coffee shop in CLT

My first visit to Giddy Goat was a surprising letdown. I was excited to check it out because they roast their coffee in-house and I thought it would be tasty, plus I had read press about how they wanted to create a nice community space, which I'm all about.  I went on a Friday morning and the place was PACKED, which didn't surprise me too much in our current culture of remote work (I was also going there to grab breakfast and get some work done), but that didn't factor into my poor experience. The space is nicely arranged with a lot of variety in seating and environment: there are quiet corners upstairs and a busy bustling downstairs area, with a busy patio out front and a secluded balcony up top. Overall, the space was more dingy and worn-out looking than I expected of a relatively new business.  Staff was milling about everywhere in the chaos and none of them seemed particularly friendly or happy to be there. I ordered a basic iced mocha and a blueberry scone and stepped aside to wait, but my order was ready within 60 seconds—not sure that's time to pull a fresh shot of espresso? In any case, the coffee tasted like nothing, definitely not freshly roasted, and I couldn't even find the mocha syrup flavor, it was just cold, slightly milky water. The scone was cold, rubbery, and inedible. I threw both in the trash and went to a different coffee shop. Might try it again on a less busy day, but I don't have high hopes.
Super cool.
I do Thursday morning yoga here and the rat some delicious empanadas 😬  They are so good. The coffee and tea options are delicious and the staff is super nice 👍
The vegan chocolate muffin? Amazing. Coffee is pretty good too!
Everything is on point.
The staff is always so friendly which makes the experience 10x better. Great coffee and atmosphere - and the empanadas always pair so well.
My golden latte was delicious and my brother couldn't get enough of the empanadas.
I came in early one morning to get a flat white and chicken empanadas. Service was quick and friendly, and both coffee and food tasted great!

Coffee is always delish (iced coffee w oat milk), the snacks (chickpea salad, chicken salad sandwich, quiche) are often a convenient lifesaver when I'm running late, and the service is super fast. I rarely have to wait long even if there is a line. Sweet and friendly staff. Nice outdoor area for people watching and doing work. Lucky to call giddy goat my neighborhood coffee spot!
Big fan of Giddy Goat. Amazing food, awesome coffee, and fabulous staff makes me keep coming back!
Best blueberry muffin ever!!
Giddy goat can take all my money. I would die for the giddy goat

Amazing coffee and bakery items here!! This has become my wife and I's favorite coffee shop now. This location is huge with outdoor and indoor seating. It's two stories so there's seating upstairs along with a bar. They have their own parking so that does help. Great location and great customer service. My favorite coffee is the iced mocha latte.
Charming place with good coffee just a bit pricey... solid 4.5 stars
They make the best lavender lattes- the burritos and empanadas are so good too
This place is the best of the best in Plaza Midwood. Great atmosphere, great coffee, and even better empanadas. I've been 10 times now since discovering it a few months back. Highly recommend!
Absolutely best coffee spot in Charlotte.  Love the breakfast burritos on weekends.
Cool place.
Great ambiance. Very good prices. Clean. wonderful area of the neighborhood. Highly recommend!
Coffee and empanadas were delicious!
Our favorite coffee shop in Plaza Midwood. They have excellent beans :)

Coffee and Empanadas. A combination I'd never thought I'd enjoy so much. The iced coffee was refreshing and was the Jumpstart I needed to start my day. The Empanadas were simply divine. Buttery. Flakey. Soft pastry filled with various delicious fillings to fit any flavor palate. My new favorite coffee spot!
Excellent burritos!
Incredible food! Love this spot.
Best coffee shop in Charlotte! Fantastic coffees, amazing empanadas and a great staff! Well done Carson!

(UPDATED REVIEW: See end!)Stopped at Giddy Goat as the last coffee shop we would try on our weekend in Charlotte. Enjoying good coffee is my favorite past time. My wife and I plan our vacations around coffee spots we want to hit. Our weekend in Charlotte was no different. In our 3 days in Charlotte we tried 5 different local shops. Giddy Goat was by far our favorite for many different reasons. First, the customer service and speed of service were top notch! Everyone was kind and even on a slammed Sunday afternoon, we received our drinks and food very quickly. Second, the location was exceptional. Giddy Goat has nice indoor and outdoor seating and the vibe was the best of all of the shops we visited. Third, the food was absolutely out of this world! We tried burritos and empanadas and both were phenomenal! Fourth, the prices were great, especially on the food. Most coffee shops that serve food offer a small selection of items and those items are outrageously expensive (and often not tasty). That is not the case here! Fifth, the coffee was great! Giddy Goat is roasting their own coffee and doing a great job! The coffee was not over roasted and the quality of the beans were great. Additionally, the quality of the drinks they produced were equally as great!  All in all, Giddy Goat was not even on our radar when we arrived in Charlotte, however it is now in our top 10 list of favorite shops we've ever been to!  Great job Giddy Goat! Keep up the great work!  (My wife and I had to come to Charlotte for a meeting a few weekends ago. We decided to turn it into a weekend and hit some of Charlottes coffee and food offerings. My wife and I love coffee and plan our vacations around trying all of the local spots. So, in prepping to come to Charlotte, we asked our friends about which places we should hit. All in all we hit 6 places in 2 days. On our final day in Charlotte I had happened upon Giddy Goat in driving to another shop and had come across it in my Google researching. It looked promising but wasn't on our original list. We made the decision to stop on our way out and we were so glad that we did! Not only did Giddy Goat have the best drinks we tried but they also had the best food and the coolest space!  From each vacation my wife and I take we purchase a coffee mug from our favorite shop to bring back with us. These mugs are memories that provide conversation points for those who drink coffee in our home. They also serve as sweet reminders of experiences we have had together. So, we purchased a mug from Giddy Goat. However, upon arriving home, the mug fell out of the top of our luggage and shattered on the floor! We were devastated. As this was the only thing we brought back from Charlotte. However, we reached out (slid into the DMs) to Giddy Goat and got in touch with Savannah, their social media manager! Savannah was so kind and even agreed to ship us another mug! Giddy Goat, thank you for the great coffee and great food! However, thank you more for being kind and understanding humans! That mug will rest in the front of our display and be one of the first ones that we hand guests so this story can be told over and over for years to come!)
Ambience is awesome and loved the outdoor seating. Their spinach empanada was delicious and unique! Would go back for empanadas!!!

Employees are always friendly & the coffee is so delicious that I order two drinks since one isn't enough for me.  LoL!  The establishment is also a great one.  There's both outdoor & indoor seating which gives customers options while working or relaxing in the coffee shop.
Excellent coffee, fantastic empanadas (I thought the Patagonia and caprese were best) and the overall atmosphere was really nice.

Such a cool spot, with delicious empenadas. Usually grab 6 for $21, perfectly sized and ready to eat. Ordering online through their website is super easy, and always ready to pickup in under 10 min. Love love love. The lemon power bites are a great midday pick me up with just enough of the sweetness one tends to be craving during an afternoon slump.
This was my third visit, it was good. I got the Nitro cold brew, it tasted water down however I'll try it again on another day.
Best coffee shop in town. Owner is very involved with creating a great environment and social events like Tango Tuesday

I've been coming here for months now. The coffee is amazing . Especially their nitro cold brew which is my coffee everyday ! Nitro cold brew in other coffee shops can have such a dark taste to it that it's almost impossible to drink .  Def recommend Brazilian nitro cold brew . I normally add oat milk & cinnamon syrup to mine .. not sure if most people add anything to their nitro cold brews
Best mocha latter ever.  best nitro Green tea
Delicious baked empanadas, especially the beef ones! Really enjoyed their iced latte too! Cute spot but gets pretty packed and has a tight layout. I'll definitely be back though!
Pretty good empanadas, kind staff, probably wouldn't go again to be honest. But overall great experience.
What a delicious brunch of empanadas and a hot cinnamon carmel protein latte with oatmilk! Can't beat this❤
Why is there no phone number
Like the drip here, espresso is ok, think they use the same bean which is kinda flat for espresso.  Staff is nice
Perfect place for a yummy bite, great coffee and to get some work done! I love the big windows and the patio outside! It's perfect!
These guys Rock!!  Favorite coffee shop in town 100%!
I love this place because of Catfish.... and the dog, and the 2 friendly guys
Best coffee in Charlotte! Hand down. The team is always warm, welcoming and helpful. I recommend the lavender/vanilla iced latter with almond milk and the spinach empanada with the green sauce!

Fantastic and friendly customer service. They're always nice and gave me a free coffee when the one I was on got cold while I was working. Empanadas are BOMB too. Hard to resist them even when I'm just popping in for an espresso to go. Oh yeah, and the space is spacious enough that you don't have to worry about there not being a spot for you. Only complaint is that the music can be a bit too loud if you're trying to listen to your own stuff.

Amazing location and great place to set and enjoy coffee with friends and family. 👍👍👍👍⭐⭐⭐⭐☕☕☕☕😋😋😋😋  Menu prices are very fair considering the decor and the location of the place 💵💵💵💵  The coffee itself (cappuccino in this case) was above average 4/5. 🤌🏼🤌🏼🤌🏼🤌🏼  The Blueberry Lemon Scone was not the best out there, it can definitely use some work. ⭐⭐  The staff was very friendly and helpful. Will definitely give another go when in the neighborhood.  😁😁😁😁
Wife Loved Coffee and she said it was better than any coffee she has ever tried. Absolutely amazing!!!
Empanadas for breakfast? Yes please! Delicious food and beverage options.
I'm not much of a coffee person but the food here is… AWESOME! I was very impressed. They make everything in house and that to me is great. Keep it up Giddy Goat staff!!!
Giddy Goat is the best. Great service, quality coffee and empanadas, and plenty of space to sit and get work done. I just wish the parking was easier. The Lot is always full.
Thought the coffee was bland and weak.  Three stars for the nice people working there only
Delicious empanadas, fresh coffee and friendly staff.
I love the coffee and atmosphere! It does get crowded if you are planning to work but haven't had an issue finding a table yet! Also, their empanadas taste delicious!
delicious coffee and spacious meeting area
Love this place. Exceptional service, friendly, and drinks are amazing
Very nice place for coffee our a beer.   Relaxing atmosphere.
Friendly neighborhood spot with great coffee and atmosphere. Become my go to weekend breakfast and coffee spot. Try the burritos.

Visited twice and brought out of town guest both times. Coffee was okay but the overall service and experience was really poor. Staff barely acknowledges you…weird vibes both times.  Would give it 1 star on the service experience alone but the facility and branding on the wall bumped it up to 2 stars. Otherwise pretty soulless place.

This is my favorite coffee shop! It is fresh, clean and the staff is always friendly. They remember your name, your order and details about your life. It's the perfect spot to work or read on your own while also being a great spot to gather and meet new friends! Not to mention - the coffee is always brewed to perfection. I've never been disappointed with my order. But I think we all really go to see Calder, the shop mascot. 🐶 I am grateful I found this spot and already treasure many of the memories I've made here!
Drop by for a great cup of coffee. And try the empanadas. House made and delicious
This place is great. Love the logo and spirit. Great coffee and empanadas. Ample room to sit, chill, or work. Super friendly staff who try to get to know you. Wish I lived locally to come more often.
Everything we had was fresh and tasty. The only minor complain is that the empanadas were awfully small for tasting so good.
great coffee, great energy. vegan options for food :)
I like the place is beautiful and big. It has desert and bakery. I tried a chocolate coconut is delicious!!
They have delicious coffees - I love the dirty chai! And they have lots of comfy areas to hang out. Great place to visit with friends or get some work done.

Another coffee shop phenomenon! Serve coffee, tea, and light pastries or empanadas along with plenty of seating inside, upstairs and outside, tables, as well as plush chairs, and provide internet access and you will have a successful spot for folks to gather. This is a delightful and friendly coffee bar that is within walking distance to various other unique shops, restaurants and attractive neighborhoods. Nice mix of ages from the young professional to older retired types came, stayed and went while I was here. They serve the pastries warm which is a real treat!
My favorite coffee shop in charlotte! Great for studying and their playlist is fire 🔥
Love the empanadas! Unexpectedly paired with coffee..makes a great start for the day!
Very friendly and accommodating batista, the coffee and Cafe bites were delicious.
Highly recommend! Best coffee shop in the area.

Who would ever think to pair empanadas & coffee? That combination was dynamite . I enjoyed each bite & the fact that I'm not an avid coffee drinker but I indulged in 3 cups while there  speaks volumes . The owners were very in-depth about explaining the process of how they roast their coffee & even gave us all a demonstration which was interesting to see in person.   It's a new coffee shop located in the booming plaza midwood area. I also had a chance to mozy off onto the rooftop area & check out that view. The Giddy Goat is where's its at to grab a cup of coffee . May your coffee be strong & your weekdays short
I love this place. New found jewel ❣️ They just should have trash and dirty plates bin upstairs
Best cup of coffee I've had in a long time.

Everything is great, just one thing..  I love coming to this coffee shop so much. The food is great, the atmosphere is wonderful and obviously the coffee is fantastic. With all that being said, if you plan to order more than one food item, be prepared. We ordered 4 empanadas and each time we've watched many customers with 1 food order go by and waited 15 minutes for ours. This isn't the first time it's happened but having to remind the barista what we ordered makes me rethink coming here for food. Even though the food is great too, sometimes finishing your drink before the food is done can be tedious.

My husband and I went to the Giddy Goat for the first time this morning and had such a great experience.  The owner was extremely personable, made a delicious coffee, and even checked to make sure it tasted how I wanted it.  He mentioned they have a lounge upstairs that will be serving wine, we will definitely be checking that out.  100% would recommend stopping here for a coffee in Plaza.  The environment is relaxed and I would imagine would be a nice place to work from.  We will absolutely be coming back!

I absolutely love the Goat. Have been visiting since it opened and shall continue for as long as they are offering coffee etc. On-site bean roasting in addition a great selection of fresh snacks from their kitchen 😋.  Great decor with outside seating.  Can't say enough good things. You guys rock ! Oh, and don't forget to say hi to the resident pup "good boy"..he's just adorable.
Great coffee, great atmosphere!
Good cafe, I recommend it

I dare you to find me a better breakfast burrito in CLT. I was initially skeptical after hearing so much fanfare, but it was legit. Distributed seasoning and the right textures are pretty tough to nail, and they crushed it.  The lemon blueberry scone was different in a wonderful way as the blueberry created a jammy middle layer. The empanadas are tasty, and we appreciate having a vegan option for my egg-free kiddo.  Coffee is pretty good, not great. But they have a great vibe that makes the visit worthwhile.
Stellar
Good coffee, good amount of setting both inside and out. Love the sparkling water.
The best coffee shop in town!
Great spot! Cozy, good coffee and delicious burritos & empanadas.

My absolute favorite coffee shop in Charlotte. I have visited over 40x in 2 months and the order is ALWAYS correct and the cappuccino is ALWAYS made correctly. Always the proper amount of milk, foam and temperature.  Recently tried the nitro brewed green tea, also very tasty!  Baristas are always friendly, every day no matter the hour.  WOULD RECOMMEND 10/10  Bonus: See the house yellow doggo who often visits and brightens your day! Always good for a smile!
Fun coffee shop with plenty of options. Normally stick to the coffee of the day and a burrito on the weekends, which is out of bounds!! Highly recommend this as a go to in Plaza Midwood.
The best. Obviously not cheap, but worth it. Location is very nice.
Giddy goat has the best staff in town.  Always friendly and personable
Awesome drip coffee and great relaxing atmosphere!

Great spot. The owner is very enthusiastic and passionate about roasting coffee. Very knowledgeable and willing to share information on roasting, bean sources, temperatures and flavors. The store is filled with the aroma of the roasters, has a friendly staff, with a comfortable and relaxing lounge. The coffee is great with a large variety to choose from.
Awesome coffee shop. Great food. Nice place to lounge and chill/ do work / homework
An amazing little coffee shop, the service is kind friendly and fast. It is a great place to go to and get some work done while sipping on a great cup of coffee

Every coffee based drink I've tried here has been great. The location is perfect and the decor is inviting. I frequently come here to get some work done. Staff is friendly and seating/space is comfortable.
Excellent atmosphere and great coffee.  Wonderful place to relax and have conversation or work!  I've never been disappointed!!  Highly recommend.  The staff members are amazingly friendly.
Best empanadas I've ever had. Best coffee - got the cinnamon latte and it tasted like Cinnamon Toast Crunch!
Always a great experience. Delicious coffee and excellent service!
Great americano, very good vibe there,  lots of space to sit, empanada was ok, a bit greasy. Will have to try their coffee next time
Get the breakfast burrito. Trust me.

This place is great. I have been here 3 times now and the coffee has always been hot and fresh. I know they are famous for their empanadas but I have not ventured to try those yet. I have had the blueberry muffin 3 times now so I can attest that they have a great blueberry muffin. We met 1 of the owners and his dog last time we were here. Nicest guy and awesome dog that will allow all the pets. This is a really great operation. As a larger man I love the seating. Having a bigger posterior doesn't always fit into the hipster chairs you find at co working spaces and coffee shops you find around this area. The seating here is very comfortable for all types of posteriors. Everyone should come here. I work from home and if I ever need a place to come work. Ill definitely be coming here.

Giddy goat is my favorite coffee shop in Plaza Midwood. Great atmosphere, cool people, and friendly environment. Love their coffee and one day I will get up there early enough to try their breakfast. They told me I had to come in before 10 because they only make so many orders of their breakfast and they sell out quickly.

The BEST coffee shop, hands down. The staff is incredible, the coffee is great, the environment is perfect for work or meeting up with friends, and the burrito might just change your life (but you can only get it Friday-Sunday…). You will love this place.
Really pleased with this addition to Plaza Midwood. The coffee is excellent and consistent. The staff are super pleasant! One of my favorite spots in Charlotte.
Best coffee and experience in CLT.

I don't think I even need to say it - every time I'm here during the weekend, it's so packed that it's sometimes tough to get to the counter. Awesome staff who work efficiently and treat people well, and the coffee and treats are great. The space is relaxed and intuitive.
Great local coffee spot, and the empanadas are on point! The staff members are also amazing!!

giddy goat is the best coffee shop ever! coffee is amazing but what really keeps me coming back is the food. the empanadas and burritos are amazing but the baked goods are the best part of all!!! the muffins, scones, bites, and different breads are all incredible and baked to perfection. so delicious and lots of dairy free / vegan options which we love to see!

Update to my original review...losing a couple stars. Giddy Goat seems to have lost a step...I've come here a couple times recently and it has been too crowded and the coffee and pastries have lost their luster for me.  Most recently I came with my mother for an early coffee and she was accosted by a cockroach running out from behind the fiddle fig(see pictures). Also having the dog roam about, even if it is a service dog, is a bit confusing for other dog owners, as I have seen several people walk in with dogs only to be told they aren't allowed, while a golden retriever roams about off leash and laying wherever it pleases.  Also, don't order the chocolate chip muffins unless you want all your chocolate chips sitting at the bottom(see pictures)...  **Had a great ice latte here, one of the best I've had in Charlotte so far! Just the right amount of bitterness, blended perfectly with the creamy milk. Really cool space with a plethora seating options, inside, outside or upstairs.  If you keep coming back, they have an app where you can build up rewards points as well. I'll definitely be back!

Unique in it's presentation of standard USA coffee and Bar.  Great coffee, I mean great, vegetarian and vegan offers with their signature empanadas.  Plenty of range.  May not be the place to go for full meal.  To catch up with friends, make friends, enjoy quality coffee and light food, this is the place to go.
Who knew you could put that many blueberries in a muffin? Yum. The pumpkin spice latte was also a showstopper.
Love this place! They have the best banana bread I have ever tasted. 😍
Food was good as we're the coffees. Very busy place.
Always consistent experience. Great customer service.  They make you feel like you've know these guys forever.
Lots of great seating. Usually not too busy. Nice variety for desserts.
Amazing place. Best coffee in CLT! Amazing customer service!
Love this place! I come to work here a few times a week.
Awesome food, drink and space!

First experience right after they opened was just fine, with a super disorganized line and the staff actively avoiding eye contact so they didn't have to answer questions. Coffee was pretty good but sort of an awkward experience.  Second time going today, the line was better managed but staff still sort of avoided helping. We got iced coffees and there was no milk available. We waited to ask for some, and they actively avoided helping us or the numerous other people waiting for assistance.  Seems super busy so they're doing fine without my business, but it's pretty basic stuff for a coffee shop to give you milk to put in your coffee. Seems like management needs to pull it together.
This place is awesome!! Great coffee, always served with a smile and the best empanadas I've had in a while!
Love the coffee, love the empanadas and croissants. By far my favorite coffee shop in Charlotte.
Great service. Yummy breakfast items.
The espresso was so good that I thought I was at the source in central america.

As an Argentinian, I can say that the empanadas are the best!  Of course, I had to order what we call “medialunas con dulce de leche” (pastries) omg, if you have not yet tried the dulce de leche, this is the best in Charlotte.  The place is amazing, with a lot of different options that you can choose from sitting outside, rooftop, or inside. I love the distance between tables.  The great environment relaxes you. I was just looking at the people inside while I was enjoying my empanadas outside, and you can feel the positive vibes are in the air!  Grab your laptop, tablet, or phone, wifi available, delicious coffee and enjoy!

We visit the location at least once a week. The coffee quality is one of the best in Charlotte. My kids love the muffins and empanadas. We make it a family stop on the weekends. The space is very inviting and has outdoor terrace to relax. The staff is very friendly and always greet you with a smile.
(Translated by Google) Good coffee, rich empanadas, excellent attention  (Original) Buenos Cafe ricas empanadas excelente atencion
I love this place VERY MUCH . Coffee , Staffs and the atmosphere 10 10 10 !!+
Great empanadas and pastries!
Great customer service and great coffee!!
Great coffee! Much better than Starbucks!
This place exceeded all of my expectations. Great food and beverage, and the service is spot on. Be sure to check out the upstairs bar and patio too. It's a local gem!
Delicious empanadas (ceviche dipping sauce is amazing with it) and nitro cold brew! The nitro green tea with honey is fantastic!
Great coffee, empanadas, ambiance and location.
Great weekend morning coffee spot

I've been twice on a Saturday.  It got very busy after 8:30am.  Great atmosphere and great service.  Seating inside and outside.  I had an Americano on the first visit and a Red Eye (coffee with 2 shots of expresso) on the second.  Both were excellent.  I like strong coffee that is smooth and not bitter.  I tried the veggie burrito and vegan cinnamon cake (warmed up) and both were very tasty and would gladly order either of them again.

The atmosphere at Giddy Goat is great. The employees are friendly and knowledgeable, the food and drink options are plentiful, and the seating options include indoor, outdoor, tables, comfy chairs and lots of outlets. The food options I saw seemed to be healthy, and I sat upstairs where it was quiet. It seems to be dog friendly inside and outside, as a gorgeous golden retriever came and made friends with several customers
Love this place. Great atmosphere, great people and even better coffee. So glad they are in the hood!

This place is truly remarkable and much more than a "coffee shop."  It is a welcoming place that feels like a second home.  The staff, baristas and ownership truly care about their customers and make people feel special.  The food and coffee is delicious and I could eat the empanadas for every meal.  I am there several times a week and many staff members have become good friends.  Through challenging times in the pandemic the team at Giddy Goat has created a culture that is positive, caring and just energizing to be around.  Many times I take a walk over just to say hello and feel a sense of community.  I am truly grateful the neighborhood and city has a place like this...
Latte was so tasty! Frothy, creamy, and smooth. Wish they had sugar free syrup options though

Love Giddy Goat their coffee, service, and setting is amazing! So excited they now have an upstairs bar as well. Big fan of Giddy Goat culture and the culture they have made. Best coffee shop in CLT hands down.
We love this coffee shop! Delicious coffee and breakfast food items, fun laid-back atmosphere, great outside patios on both levels and they support the local community too.

This is one of my favorite coffee businesses in Charlotte…fresh, delicious coffee and food, great service, clean and inviting atmosphere. I would highly recommend to all who enjoy quality coffee and food for reasonable prices.
Great addition to Plaza Midwood. Great service, coffee and snacks.
The breakfast burritos are bangin. Only negative is having to walk upstairs for beers if you come for an event. Very friendly staff.

I'm hesitant to share this review because I don't want too many people finding out about my all-time favorite place in Charlotte to work from. Coffee & empanadas are amazing and there is always a cozy seat to sit and work.
Great place to meet people for coffee.

This place continues to get increasingly popular and deservedly so. Amazing coffee, great space, awesome owners/staff. And in my experience, this is the only coffeeshop in Charlotte which combines fantastic coffee with great baked goods/snacks, all of which are house-made. Try the small chocolate or lemon energy balls - they are amazing. They recently started croissants too which are also very tasty and fresh.  All in all, a true gem.
Service is always friendly and quick. Best burrito in Charlotte. The kind of local coffee shop every neighborhood wants!
Friendly staff, great coffee, and even better empanadas.
Great service. Love the dirty chai

Wow! I see why this place has 5 stars. Great coffee, excellent burritos, great service/staff, and to top it off a vibe/environment that can't be beat. Bring your family or friends to hang out….show up solo to get some work done, it doesn't matter you will feel right at home. Look forward to my next visit to Giddy!

Spacious modern spot without overdoing the modern design so it fits right into this neighborhood serrounded by the likes of Snug Harbor and Thanos street tavern... basically a neighborhood with a character. Incredible coffee quality. UPDATE: Delicious VEGAN empanadas on the menu!!
Came to this shop for some expresso. Such a cute coffee shop and has a top deck with outdoor picnic table seating as well.
Our favorite coffee spot in Plaza, great breakfast burritos and empanadas. Also great space to sit and enjoy your breakfast and friendly people.
I absolutely love The Giddy Goat!  It is my favorite coffee shop in Charlotte.  Both coffee and food are amazing, and the staff is great!

I'm blown away by how tasty The Giddy Goat is! Love their iced coffee, hot coffee, and espresso. They also have a great breakfast menu that includes empanadas, burritos, and so much more. Highly recommend visiting The Giddy Goat - I'll be here every weekend!

This coffee shop has incredible customer service and was so accomodating on my last visit. Our street was out of power for a few days and the owner went out of his way to make sure I had a good experience. 10/10!! And great coffee too 😍

Great coffee, roasted right here! You even have roast choices for cold brew. Great set up inside and outside, ample space and perfectly accomodating for work on your devices. Very nice ambiance! The staff is wonderful and the food is delicious. All made in house! My personal favorite is the chicken empanada.
Great coffee and breakfast burrito! A perfect place to sit and work, catch up with friends, and enjoy the weather with the big garage-style doors open.

I visit Charlotte once a year to see my mom.  Today,  I had to kill time for about an hour close to the hospital.  I'm so glad I found this cute place.  I love the space, their breakfast empanadas, and the company- a lovely four legged friend came to keep me company for an hour.
Great space and super good coffee! This might be my new spot!
I Enjoyed the coffee and the empanadas, Cody was amazing he was very friendly and kind

The Giddy Goat is a coffee shop and roaster located in Plaza Midwood in the former Sushi Guru space. It has indoor and outdoor seating; an espresso bar; breakfast, brunch, lunch, afternoon snack menus; and beer, wine, and cocktails in the evening.  This incredible coffee shop came HIGHLY recommended by a local.  Very attractive indoor and outdoor space. Locally owned by Rhyne Davis along with co-founder Carson Clough. Giddy proudly serves all coffee roasted in-house. 3 cold brew coffee blends on tap. Self-serve water station with the sparkling option, beautiful patio, and rooftop  The mural on the side of Giddy Goat is by Darion Fleming, aka Da. Flemingo. Darion is a Charlotte local by way of Washington D.C. Darion stopped doing art midway through high school and delightfully picked it back up in the past few years. The exact address is 1217 The Plaza next to Whiskey Warehouse and across the street from Supperland restaurant.
Hands down the best coffee and the best coffee shop in Charlotte. Be sure to take some freshly roasted coffee home with you. The breakfast burritos are the best in town!
Coffee has only gotten better, I'll come back!
Incredible in nitro cold brew

we're so happy to have a neighborhood coffee shop within walking distance of our apartment. the atmosphere is really laid back and the coffee and food are delicious. these guys know what they're doing.  get the goat burrito and their house drip, you won't be disappointed. bring your dogs to their off leash dog area in the back and enjoy great atmosphere and friendly service.

Lovely little coffee shop in the city.  The coffee and scones are wonderful, you must stop by if you're in the area!  The views are amazing this time of year as the shop is all opened up and you can sit to enjoy the sights and food.
The breakfast empanada here was very good! Coffee was good as well. Nice outdoor seating with a good vibe
Great coffee, food and atmosphere! So many places to sit, too! We're here every weekend!
Great coffee. Great people. Great empanada's - so good there wasn't time to take a pic before it was gone!
oh my... It's the best coffee shop ever.. I wanna drink here everyday!
Best empanadas! They tasted just like the ones I had in Argentina. Try the Patagonia and caprese!
If all the other great reviews don't convince you, let me say this place is awesome. Great service, great selection, and delicious coffee. Highly recommend
Nice place but a bit generic - could use a vibe. Coffee was fine but nothing to write home about.
Great Coffee and great people. Cheers.

One of my favorite coffee places! The staff is friendly, fast and knowledgeable! Great place to relax on weekends, catch up with friends, or grab a drink to go. The addition of food has been delicious!
Great Coffee and great food. The coffee addict in me wishes there was a larger size.
Great place for morning breakfast
My wife and my favorite coffee shop. The service, the coffee, the food, and the location are all excellent! The empanadas are a must have!

Free refills on drip coffee. Sparkling water on tap. A friendly dog walking around.Tons of windows and cozy seating. Workspaces galore. This place is a DREAM. I'll be back, again and again and again...

I visited this place after a long day of work. I got a vanilla latte with oatmilk, which was very good. I also asked the guy who took my order to pick me out an empanada, and he gave the Mediterranean one. It was so so good. The guy who took my order was very nice, and the girl who made the empanadas and I chatted a little bit and she is so so sweet! I will definitely be back & will be there more frequently when I'm back at college. :)
Stopped in for the first time and had the dark roast nitro cold brew. It was very smooth and delicious. Very cool atmosphere and will definitely be back. Love supporting local!
Excellent score on all counts - Product, Service, and Environment.
One of my new favorites. Great space, great coffee, friendly baristas. Parking on site as well.

Best coffee shop in Charlotte with a fantastic indoor/outdoor space! Great hangout spot, place to work remotely, read a book, etc. The owner's cute dog roams around the shop and he is a sweetheart. Place is overall very cozy and welcoming. 10/10 addition to Plaza Midwood.
Awesome place...The owner is a real cool dude..#supportsmallbusinesses
Great coffee and fantastic spot to work remotely!
Fantastic place. Coffee is delicious and the food offerings are also great. Wonderful outdoor space to get some work done!
Love this new spot in the neighborhood. Really great coffee, awesome empanadas and burritos and not over priced.  Perfect!
Food and drink quality is great, can't go wrong with the menu. Service can be a little hit or miss when busy. General vibe is great as a place to relax, do some work, or just watch the world go by.
Great coffee roasted in house, really friendly and personal staff, and a really well designed space that's great to hang out for a few hours. Definitely my favorite coffee shop in CLT
Great coffee and even better service. New go to spot!
Delicious coffee and they're super quick! Favorite coffee in Plaza. Come here at least once a week and am never disappointed
Nitro and empanadas both slap, great spot
Cool spot nice little roof deck.

Excellent! Beautiful space. Locally, independently owned shop with all coffee roasted in house. 3 cold brew coffee blends on tap. Self-serve water station with sparkling option, beautiful patio and rooftop. I drank the Costa Rican drip and can give it a near - perfect score. Sign up for loyalty and get a free drip immediately. I will return ASAP.
What an awesome spot! Great coffee and exactly what Plaza needed!  Can't wait for the beer and wine service!

Great latte and the empanadas are fantastic. The sweet corn, breakfast, and patagonia empanadas were all delicious. The chimichurri was incredibly flavorful. Definitely look this place up if you're in the area.
Best coffee shop in Charlotte. Love the staff. Highly recommend the Shaka breakfast burrito!
A different alternative to Starbucks or Dunkin especially if you want to have leisurely hang out in the morning. Can't wait for when they open up the nighttime/bar part of their business.

The coffee is delicious! I also love this space. It is comfortable enough to sit and work for a while on your own or meet up with friends and hang out on their nice patio. A nice variety of coffee beverages offered, and I am excited to see what else they do!
Cute coffee shop with a lot of space to sit. I tried an iced mocha and a spinach empanada and they were very tasty
Hands down the best in the city!   Great price and I couldn't get over how well this baby stayed together! The burrito was bursting with flavor in every bite! I can't wait to go back!
The staff is always so friendly & the coffee is amazing.
Coffee is good and service is good as well. The person who made me and my friends coffee was super nice. Will come here again.
Walked in, greeted with superb customer service. The matcha was delicious! Absolutely love the outside seating! Perfect for those who want both nature and coffee! Cannot wait to come back asap.
Really good coffee!  Breakfast burritos were awesome.  This place kind of snuck up on me when it opened, but I will definitely be going back.
The coffee and the staff are awesome! Great addition to the Plaza Midwood area.
The coffee is awesome. The breakfast burritos are awesome. Great place for small business meetups and laptop friendly with Wifi. Will definitely be coming back. Love the ambiance here!
The coffee and breakfast burritos are amazing. I am loving them as an addition to plaza midwood.  I am excited to try more of the menu and check out the beer and wine lounge area up top.
The best coffee in Charlotte and the atmosphere is as good as it gets

After several visits I treated myself to The Goat burrito last weekend and it was delicious.  Big enough for two people with just the right spiciness. The atmosphere and vibe of Giddy Goat keeps me coming for extra hot mocha lattes.

The Giddy Goat houses so many different delicious artisan coffees with a calming and modern vibe. What sets this place over the top is the willingness of staff to take the time and explain the different types of coffee that they have. For someone who doesn't really deviate from the usual, I felt like this was really nice and it also helped me develop a new respect for coffee! This just goes to show how passionate the owners are about creating not only someone's new favorite spot but an exciting experience!
Great coffee and very friendly staff! They roast their own coffee and it was one of the best lattes I have ever had. Highly recommend
Great coffee and atmosphere. Good place to sit down with friends or get some work done. The staff is really friendly and welcoming.
Great out door seating and view, wonderful friendly staff.
Awesome burrito and strong coffee :D
Coffee is roasted fresh in house. Lattes are delicious, baked goods always fresh and staff makes one feel most welcome. Outdoor patio very nice and upstairs for private parties. Fantastic venue.
Good place for coffee and socializing. Friendly staff.

dropped in to pick up a gift card for someone and decided to get a latte. it was strong (I mean that in a positive way) and tho am working on reducing my caffeine intake, I can see myself heading back. I took my cup to go, but noticed there was plenty of seating & I also appreciated the vibe (there's a huge is it coffee grinder at the entrance). Enzo, the barista who made my latte has an affable demeanour.
Most delicious matcha latte!
Good coffee but a little slow and it's a small place so it made me worried about covid
Really enjoy the people and coffee at the store! Such a great addition to the neighborhood and I am always greeted with a smile.
The coffee is awesome (duh), the roasters are super cool to see, the baked stuff is all awesome! Such a good place to chill

Really neat local coffee spot. The coffee and food/snack options are all very good. They roast their beans in the shop, and to that end, the staff are particularly knowledgeable in what they're selling, from raw bean to cup. The Giddy Goat has a very endearing neighborhood coffee shop feel, while at the same time offering plenty of unique features you don't usually see in a lot of other local coffee shops (or in many of the chains, for that matter). It's a great place to work into a morning coffee routine. Will definitely be back again.
Great coffee at a fair price.  Been several times so far and everything is great.  The owner is very nice as well.

Highly recommend it. Cozy atmosphere. I am a coffee lover and their coffee is the best I have ever tried so far. Really good quality and taste. They roast coffee beans inside the shop so you can smell the coffee all over the shop. Customer service is amazing. Carson is one of the owners and he is an awesome guy. His service dog is really friendly, too. Tip: get early to try their burritos. I went in the morning and I had the chance to try them but they go out really fast. They even make them the same morning they sell them. My favorite is the Shaka! They have not even opened yet and they are killing it.  Good job.

We love trying new coffee places and this is one of the places we'll definitely be going back to. The coffee is delicious, prices are fair and the owner is super friendly. We love the atmosphere and hope everyone gets a chance to try
New favorite coffee spot in Charlotte! The perfect read a book on your day off kind of spot! Not the great employees!!
Awesome place.
Fantastic place, awesome coffee! I accidentally went after they had closed but Carson the owner was kind enough to make me a cup of coffee. Will definitely be my go to!
Terrific coffee and very friendly staff! Look forward to enjoying your rooftop in warmer weather!
Great new spot in Plaza Midwood, with great quality coffee.
Good vibe! Good coffee!

This is the best coffee I've tried in Charlotte! I go 2-3 times a week. I get an iced coffee or iced latte with oat milk, and they're both fantastic. Not sure why Google says it's closed because they're definitely open 7 days a week.  Sometimes they have a walk up window which was a great Covid safe option and convenient if you are walking your dog or in a rush. Seems like they stopped once the weather got bad, hopefully they open that option again.  10/10 recommend!

My husband and I LOVE this new coffee shop in Plaza! It has an awesome spacious atmosphere and excellent coffee. Everyone working is here is super friendly and nice - separates them from than other coffee shops around here! Ever since we realized they were open, we have only been coming here. Love it!
Food is good,Coffee is good, the Pandora station is just what you want on a Sunday morning! Top marks!
The Giddy Goat is just what Plaza Midwood needed, great coffee and the friendliest staff!
Great tasting espresso and very cool, comfortable and clean environment! Highly recommend.

The environment is fantastic. Super welcoming, great aesthetic. The baristas are educated and skilled. Staff is very friendly. Two stories of seating and wonderful immersion between the indoors and out, will be greater in warmer months. The coffee was exceptional. Latte far exceeded expectations, phenomenal quality espresso utilized. I really enjoy this place, it's the type of place I will go for coffee, and spend a lot of time there doing productive things like checking e-mail or browsing my instagram feed. I highly recommend the Giddy Goat.
Delicious coffee and great service! Had the dirty chai latte and highly recommend.
Awesome space, awesome coffee
If you haven't been here yet... stop what you're doing and head on over. Great place, Great people. No joke!
100% recommended, my cappuccino was awesome and I definitely going to come back!!!!! Carson the owner. Is very Kind..... come on guys for this weather is coffee time!!!!!!
Best coffee in town.  I'm originally from the Mediterranean region and a regular coffee drinker 2 espressos a day plus a cappuccino sometimes.  This place is legit. My new favorite place!
Fantastic space, with fantastic owners and absolutely fantastic coffee!
Great new neighborhood spot! Walk up window for ordering too.
